name: mullion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a narrow vertical bar between the panes (= pieces) of glass in a window: The delicate mullions frame the garden space.stone mullion window The stone mullion windows were made to order.
More examplesFewer examplesThe external glass was separated by light timber mullions. There are no vertical mullions on the windows.The property has original features such as exposed beams and mullion windows.The mullions are solid steel, but very thin. Stone mullions divided the tall narrow windows.
